title: Innovative Solutions Announces Successful Use of DarcyIQ in Strategic Collaboration Agreement with AWS Focused on Smaller Businesses
content:
A Premier Tier AWS Partner with a specialized focus on SMBs, Innovative Solutions is distinctly positioned to help growing businesses leverage the power of AWS

ROCHESTER, N.Y., Aug. 21, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Innovative Solutions, a Premier Tier AWS Partner and global leader of Generative AI, Data, and Cloud services solutions for growing businesses, today announced that the company has achieved several important milestones in its Strategic Collaboration Agreement (SCA) with Amazon Web Services (AWS) focused on helping small and medium businesses (SMBs) achieve meaningful growth. Innovative Solutions was a launch partner for the AWS SMB Competency in January 2024, and as such, is one of a small subset of AWS partners uniquely positioned to help emerging and growing companies on AWS.

Uniquely, Innovative utilized DarcyIQ, an agentic AI consulting platform that accelerates sales, to rapidly reach, inspire, and assist SMBs with growing on the AWS cloud. Using DarcyIQ, Innovative has tripled new customer acquisition in the SMB segment in the last 8 months.

"Innovative Solutions was born out of the SMB space and our mission is to help every SMB leverage the power of AWS," added Justin Copie, CEO of Innovative Solutions. "Right now, SMB cloud spend is expected to reach $578B over the next two years, and at the same time, the overwhelming majority (91%) of small business technology transactions are facilitated or influenced by a partner. We aim to be the trusted partner that helps small and midsize businesses navigate the AWS ecosystem for their maximum benefit."

As part of its SCA, AWS has co-invested with Innovative Solutions in go-to-market activities in the SMB space as well as initiatives to support SMB customers on AWS. With AWS's support, Innovative has expanded its second headquarters in Boca Raton, FL in support of this strategic collaboration, brought additional products to market, and built new technology that allows growing businesses to buy AWS services instead of having to build from scratch.

"DarcyIQ helped us build upon Innovative's AWS SMB and Generative AI competencies," said Travis Rehl, CTO, Innovative Solutions. "We are clearly at the forefront of building the products and solutions that will continue to make genAI and genBI initiatives accessible to businesses of all sizes on AWS."

Innovative Solutions has specialized expertise in working with companies in manufacturing, retail, financial services, life sciences/healthcare, and leverages DarcyIQ to perform discovery, analyze customer buying intent, and ultimately generate Statements of Work in minutes. For more information about Innovative Solutions, visit www.innovativesol.com/.

About Innovative Solutions

Innovative Solutions is a leading provider of cloud services for growing businesses. With more than three decades of experience and a 99.7% customer retention rate, Innovative Solutions has deep expertise in Generative AI, Machine Learning, Data and Analytics, Cloud Modernization, Cloud Migrations, and Managed Cloud Services. As a Premier Tier AWS Partner with Generative AI competency, Innovative Solutions is at the forefront of helping businesses leverage the power of the cloud and AI to drive growth and innovation. For more information about Innovative Solutions, visit www.innovativesol.com and for more information about DarcyIQ, visit www.darcyiq.com.
summary: Innovative Solutions, a Premier Tier AWS Partner and global leader of Generative AI, Data, and Cloud services solutions for growing businesses, has achieved significant milestones in its Strategic Collaboration Agreement (SCA) with Amazon Web Services (AWS) focused on helping small and medium businesses (SMBs) achieve meaningful growth. Innovative Solutions was a launch partner for the AWS SMB Competency in January 2024 and is one of a small subset of AWS partners uniquely positioned to help emerging and growing companies on AWS. The company used DarcyIQ, an agentic AI consulting platform that accelerates sales, to rapidly reach, inspire, and assist SMBs with growing on the AWS cloud. As part of its SCA, Amazon has co-invested with Innovative solutions in go-to-market activities in the SMB space and initiatives to support SMB customers on AWS, including expanding its second headquarters in Boca Raton, FL.
shortSummary: Innovative Solutions, a Premier Tier AWS Partner with a focus on SMBs, achieved significant milestones in its strategic collaboration with AWS, leveraging DarcyIQ to enhance growth and innovation.

FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

How Darcy can transform your business
How Darcy can transform your business
How Darcy can transform your business
What is DarcyIQ?
DarcyIQ is an AI-powered platform that transforms the entire consulting lifecycle. From joining client meetings with real-time insights to generating complete proposals and presentations, Darcy eliminates bottlenecks throughout your business development process - allowing your team to handle 4x more opportunities while delivering superior client outcomes.
How does DarcyIQ deliver such dramatic improvements?
DarcyIQ eliminates the traditional bottlenecks in three ways: First, it joins your client calls to provide real-time expertise. Second, it automates technical documentation creation, reducing delivery time from weeks to hours. Third, it leverages your historical project data to generate highly accurate proposals. This allows your team to respond to customer needs immediately, close deals 70% faster, and handle 4x more opportunities with your existing staff.
How quickly will we see ROI from DarcyIQ?
Most consulting firms achieve positive ROI within 60 days through increased deal velocity and win rates. The onboarding process takes less than 3 weeks, and you'll see immediate impact as your first proposals are delivered in hours instead of weeks. Our customers typically experience a 20-30x return on investment within the first year through increased revenue, improved margins, and dramatically higher team productivity.
Which types of consulting firms benefit most from DarcyIQ?
DarcyIQ delivers exceptional results for technical consulting firms, system integrators, management consultancies, and financial advisory firms. Any business where specialized expertise must be consistently communicated through high-stakes client documentation will see dramatic improvements. Firms experiencing growth constraints due to technical resource limitations, long sales cycles, or inconsistent proposal quality are ideal candidates. Darcy is particularly transformative for businesses scaling beyond $5M in annual revenue where technical pre-sales bottlenecks begin limiting growth.
What deployment options are available?
DarcyIQ is primarily delivered as a secure, enterprise-grade Multi-Tenant SaaS solution, offering immediate access with zero infrastructure management required. For organizations with specific compliance, regulatory, or security requirements, DarcyIQ is available as a license and is able to run on a private infrastructure. Contact our sales team to discuss your specific deployment needs and receive a tailored solution that aligns with your organization's requirements.

A Premier Tier AWS Partner with a specialized focus on SMBs, Innovative Solutions is distinctly positioned to help growing businesses leverage the power of AWS
ROCHESTER, N.Y., Aug. 21, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Innovative Solutions, a Premier Tier AWS Partner and global leader of Generative AI, Data, and Cloud services solutions for growing businesses, today announced that the company has achieved several important milestones in its Strategic Collaboration Agreement (SCA) with Amazon Web Services (AWS) focused on helping small and medium businesses (SMBs) achieve meaningful growth. Innovative Solutions was a launch partner for the AWS SMB Competency in January 2024, and as such, is one of a small subset of AWS partners uniquely positioned to help emerging and growing companies on AWS.
Uniquely, Innovative utilized DarcyIQ, an agentic AI consulting platform that accelerates sales, to rapidly reach, inspire, and assist SMBs with growing on the AWS cloud. Using DarcyIQ, Innovative has tripled new customer acquisition in the SMB segment in the last 8 months.
"Innovative Solutions was born out of the SMB space and our mission is to help every SMB leverage the power of AWS," added Justin Copie, CEO of Innovative Solutions. "Right now, SMB cloud spend is expected to reach $578B over the next two years, and at the same time, the overwhelming majority (91%) of small business technology transactions are facilitated or influenced by a partner. We aim to be the trusted partner that helps small and midsize businesses navigate the AWS ecosystem for their maximum benefit."
As part of its SCA, AWS has co-invested with Innovative Solutions in go-to-market activities in the SMB space as well as initiatives to support SMB customers on AWS. With AWS's support, Innovative has expanded its second headquarters in Boca Raton, FL in support of this strategic collaboration, brought additional products to market, and built new technology that allows growing businesses to buy AWS services instead of having to build from scratch.
"DarcyIQ helped us build upon Innovative's AWS SMB and Generative AI competencies," said Travis Rehl, CTO, Innovative Solutions. "We are clearly at the forefront of building the products and solutions that will continue to make genAI and genBI initiatives accessible to businesses of all sizes on AWS."
Innovative Solutions has specialized expertise in working with companies in manufacturing, retail, financial services, life sciences/healthcare, and leverages DarcyIQ to perform discovery, analyze customer buying intent, and ultimately generate Statements of Work in minutes. For more information about Innovative Solutions, visit www.innovativesol.com/.
About Innovative Solutions
Innovative Solutions is a leading provider of cloud services for growing businesses. With more than three decades of experience and a 99.7% customer retention rate, Innovative Solutions has deep expertise in Generative AI, Machine Learning, Data and Analytics, Cloud Modernization, Cloud Migrations, and Managed Cloud Services. As a Premier Tier AWS Partner with Generative AI competency, Innovative Solutions is at the forefront of helping businesses leverage the power of the cloud and AI to drive growth and innovation. For more information about Innovative Solutions, visit www.innovativesol.com and for more information about DarcyIQ, visit www.darcyiq.com.
SOURCE Innovative Solutions

argos_summary: Innovative Solutions, a Premier Tier AWS Partner, announced milestones in its Strategic Collaboration Agreement with AWS to help SMBs grow on the cloud. The company leveraged its agentic AI consulting platform DarcyIQ to triple SMB customer acquisition in eight months and has expanded its Boca Raton headquarters, added products, and built technology enabling businesses to purchase AWS services directly. As a launch partner for AWS’s SMB Competency, Innovative offers expertise across manufacturing, retail, finance, and life sciences, and aims to be the trusted partner guiding SMBs through AWS’s ecosystem. The partnership includes AWS co‑investment in go‑to‑market activities and support for SMB customers, positioning Innovative at the forefront of generative AI and cloud modernization solutions for small and midsize businesses.
